Message: I have a new feature of Visual Composer to share with you Hey! Michael here from Visual Composer. Since you gave us your email in exchange for useful info, there is something cool I want to share with you! ?? Recently, we launched a new Visual Composer update, which opens up new possibilities for you if you plan to develop websites for your clients! ?? Role Manager and Role Manager Presets are the security key for your web designs. I've posted about the new features in our Facebook group - join us there and let us know what you think! P.S. Let me know if you are planning to upgrade to Premium, I have some presents in my pocket that I can share with you. ??Enjoy your day! Cheers, Michael Makijenko, CEO at Visual Composer

TrailheaDX Sessions, H12 Errors, and the Future of Work [Upcoming Event] Meet the Team at TrailheaDX 2021 ? Join us at TrailheaDX on June 23rd to see a session on using Heroku to deliver customer experiences. Check out product demos showing a progressive web app on Heroku integrated with Salesforce and real-time event streams for a connected end-to-end experience. Also, meet members of the Heroku and Salesforce Platform product team for live Q&A.

Subject Line: Are you there? I?m removing inactive subscribers. And I notice that you haven?t opened an email from me in the past [add number] months. I understand if you don?t want any emails from me. No hard feelings :). But if you want to continue receiving my emails, just click the below link to confirm, and I won?t delete you. I still want emails from you. There?s no need to opt in again. You just need to click. Sincerely, Lan

Subject Line: Could you please help me out? Body: Hi Juan, I just read your post. It?s both well written and useful. I especially like how you post food pictures. I am emailing you today to let you know I have written the post. I think you will find it useful, as it is relevant to your post on [add post name]. Could you take a quick peek at it and let me know what you think? Enjoy! Lan

I would really like to write for your blog Hi Juana I am a big fan of your blog. You share a lot of useful tips here. I especially like your post [add post title]. It?s both well written and useful. I would like to contribute a unique post for your blog as well. I have read your guidelines and will follow them while writing the post. [Confirm page points of guidelines you?ll follow, like: This will be a long-form post that is 1,500+ words long with a lot of statistics and examples.] Here are a few samples of my work? <links> If you?re interested, I would love to work with you on the topics and formats that best meet your needs for the blog. Would you prefer sample topics, a draft outline, or a complete post? [modify based on blog?s guidelines] Sincerely, Lan

I just listened to your podcast Hi Juana I recently discovered your work when I listened to the podcast [add podcast name]. You shared so many useful insights there. I wanted to let you know I run a podcast too. It?s called [add name + link], and I was wondering if you?d like to come on the air. The podcast has [mention number of subscribers, downloads, etc.]. Prominent people like [names] have already taken part. Would you be interested? I will be happy to interview you at a date and time that is convenient for you. Sincerely,  Lan

Meet the new Customer Support Representative Dear team, I am pleased to introduce you to [Name] who is starting today as a Customer Support Representative. She will be providing technical support and assistance to our users, making sure they enjoy the best experience with our products. Feel free to greet [Name] in person and congratulate her with the new role! Best regards, Lan

Vacation request for September, 10-15 Dear Mr./Ms. [Last name], I would like to request a vacation from Monday, September 9th till Friday, September 13th. I will make sure to complete all my current projects and pending tasks in advance before the vacation. My colleagues [Name] and [Name] will cover my responsibilities during my absence. Looking forward to your approval. Sincerely, Lan

Do you have student discounts for the Annual Coding Conference? Greetings, I would like to ask if you provide student discounts for tickets to the Annual Coding Conference. I?m a full-time student at the University of Texas and I?m very excited about your event, but unfortunately, the ticket price is too high for me. I would appreciate if you could offer me an educational discount. Looking forward to hearing from you! Best, Lan

Complaint regarding the quality of the headphones Hi there, I purchased the headphones at Perfect Music on Monday, August 11. Later, I discovered that the left headphone wasn?t working. Unfortunately, the staff refused to replace the headphones or return my money although I provided the receipt. I?m deeply disappointed about the quality of the product and the disrespectful treatment I received in your store. I hope to have this issue resolved and get my money back, otherwise, I will have to take further actions. Best, Lan

Could you please do us a small favor? Body: Hi Juana I hope you are enjoying your recent purchase of [name of the product]. If you found it useful, we would like you to help us and others who would like to buy it too. So, could you please visit this page [insert link] and leave a review? It should take you less than three minutes. We really appreciate your help. Sincerely, Lan
